message:
1. caching
2. offline-reading
3. share feature (facebook, twitter, instapaper, etc)
4. youtube embeds
5. growl/toast notifications
sounds good ..do you plan on implementing those features in that order .. makes sense to me :)
I'll probably start from the easiest first, 3-5-2-1-4
4 is probably the easiest if message contains YouTube.com then spilt at every space then loop to find URL then embed at the bottom
